info.name: Developer About Pages
info.description:
This style makes about pages to look'n'feel like Developer Theme in Firefox(Aurora/Nightly).
Currently supports:
Browser main color for while page loads(default=WHITE)
about:blank
about:preferences
about:config
about:home
about:addons
about:newtab
about:neterror
